= Introduction =

SparkwiseOS is the open source code used to run the online free service http://sparkwi.se

It can be set up and run on any Linux, Windows or Mac OS X machine in a development and production mode. It is developed in Java and OO Javascript. SparkwiseOS has plenty of open source [Dependencies dependencies].

Follow setup instructions to create OAuth application [SetupKeys keys] with third party services, such as Google Analytics and Facebook, as well as set up a [SetupServer server] running Sparkwise.

_More documentation and code to come in the following weeks. Please get in touch for any reason: David Karam dkaram@sparkwi.se _
